item.description:
Help the campaign to get out the vote!
The Concord office will be directing volunteers to make phone calls and/or visit the voters who have already signed up to support Ron Paul.

This is the best use of our time this weekend.

Who votes is who decides - it doesn't get any simpler than that.

Forget about everything else (forget about grievances, forget about history, foget about differences) . Help with this. Forget about the future if we fail.

HELP!

email richyankee@gmail.com or call 603 305 5987 to discuss, ask questions etc.

PLEASE HELP!



alternative to the local Nashua effort:

New Hampshire Campaign Headquarters
45 South Main Street
Concord, NH 03301

603-227-0131
item.name: GOTV
